channel.title: Bug List & Missing content [Report bugs here!]
channel.description:
[size=16pt]Please report any bugs or missing content (that isn't on the [url=https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,667424.0.html]todo list[/url]!) here. Please post as much information as possible for bugs, including ways to replicate the bug if you know how.[/size]
[u][b]Miscellaneous bugs:[/b][/u]
[ul][li]Crash on login ([b]HIGH PRIORITY[/b])[/li] [li]When changing graphics in-game, the attack tab can disappear (fixed with relog)[/li] [li][s]Trading crash[/s] [b]FIXED[/b][/li] [li][s]Buying items from main stock dupe[/s] [b]FIXED[/b][/li][/ul]
[u][b]Skill bugs (incorrect xp, animations, abusability, etc):[/b][/u]
[ul][li]Mining: Missing depleted ids[/li] [li]Cooking: check for fire expiration[/li] [li][s]Prayer: Bury bone action bug (caused by block actions not getting undone when action stopped)[/s] [b]FIXED[/b][/li][/ul]
[u][b]Missing/Incorrect NPC Details (animations, spawns, drops, etc):[/b][/u]
[ul][li][/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[b][u]Missing/Incorrect Weapon Details (animations, bonuses, styles, etc):[/u][/b]
[ul][li]Battleaxes[/li] [li][/li][/ul]
[b][u]Missing/Incorrect Item Details (noting issues, shop values, etc):[/u][/b]
[ul][li]All examine info[/li] [li][/li][/ul]

item.title: Bug List & Missing content [Report bugs here!]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

It’s player positioning that is off, not NPC position. I double checked by teleporting to people once I thought I was bugged, and yea I would do ::teleto and in the end it wouldn’t show me on top of the person.

Read full topic
item.source: Bug List & Missing content [Report bugs here!]

item.title: Bug List & Missing content [Report bugs here!]
item.dc:creator: @Lin Lin
item.description:
@Lin wrote:

[quote=“zuppers, post:19, topic:549048”]Um I know this is kinda vague but sometimes the client would lose position of your character and desync from the server e.g you’re actually 1 tile over. I noticed it happens a lot while running & pathfinding around solid objects after burying bones(might not be related). Relogging will show you your correct position. This also happened twice to me while running & loading new regions you would clip through a wall and then be unable to move as all pathing data sent to the server thereafter is incorrect(I assume). This also happened a few times while running to different ores while mining.[/quote]This, except I don’t think it fully explains what happens. NPC positioning will be off, not sure if player positioning will be off. Frell and I think it’s related to following. I couldn’t really click to move anywhere, but trying to interact with a player would bring me next to them iirc. Interacting with an NPC didn’t always work and usually brought me to the wrong position, probably because they were in the wrong place. I believe it’s related to region switching when running, since it didn’t happen until after I started running up to Varrock but decided to go back, and then tried following Frell and from there I was stuck.

Read full topic

item.title: Bug List & Missing content [Report bugs here!]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

zuppers:

Um I know this is kinda vague but sometimes the client would lose position of your character and desync from the server e.g you’re actually 1 tile over. I noticed it happens a lot while running & pathfinding around solid objects after burying bones(might not be related). Relogging will show you your correct position. This also happened twice to me while running & loading new regions you would clip through a wall and then be unable to move as all pathing data sent to the server thereafter is incorrect(I assume). This also happened a few times while running to different ores while mining.

This… I was trying SOOO HARD to reproduce the issue while I was recording, and couldn’t.

From what I’ve read/heard/noticed, it seems to happen a lot when running from Lumbridge to Varrock (Probably because that’s where the only banks are?)

What happen to me when I was running is I noclipped through a diagonal fence (idk if that’s important), and then stopped. From there my guy was just screwed. Couldn’t move or anything. I re-log, and boom, I’m on the opposite side of the fence.

Read full topic
item.source: Bug List & Missing content [Report bugs here!]

item.title: Bug List & Missing content [Report bugs here!]
item.dc:creator: @zuppers zuppers
item.description:
@zuppers wrote:

Um I know this is kinda vague but sometimes the client would lose position of your character and desync from the server e.g you’re actually 1 tile over. I noticed it happens a lot while running & pathfinding around solid objects after burying bones(might not be related). Relogging will show you your correct position. This also happened twice to me while running & loading new regions you would clip through a wall and then be unable to move as all pathing data sent to the server thereafter is incorrect(I assume). This also happened a few times while running to different ores while mining.

Read full topic

item.title: Bug List & Missing content [Report bugs here!]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Davidi2:

I’ll have to figure out what’s going on with banking. Lots of people were getting issues that I wasnt able to replicate on my account

My issues seem to have stemmed from when I first put an item in the new tab.
When I took it out of the same tab, everything went to hell XD
It started with that bronze sword going missing (Hence why it’s not seen at the start of the gif) and then just got chaotic from there.

Edit:
Nice gate.

Edit again:
Cows get stuck on the rocks, we thought it was the flowers, but it’s the rocks. I fudgeed this gif up when trying to type while recording…

Dancing with a calf:

Long-range combat:

Trading in combat:

Edit 3:
It’s been stated with mining, but same issue with woodcutting… Distance checking is off:

If you can’t tell, I should be 1 tile closer to that tree… When I click it, it auto-runs me directly to it. But if I stand 1 tile off and click it, it also lets me cut.

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

Davidi2:

ID isnt really a bug I just dont have item examine info so its with that placeholder atm. Thanks for the anim though, does anyone know the anim ids for battleaxes? Should be 2 of them I think

I know the id isn’t a bug, but I figured that’s something you didn’t want seen…

I did a google and found this:
ID(s): 1363, 1365, 1367, 1369, 13671, 1373, 1375, 1377, 13973, 13975395 - Battleaxe (ACCURATE)395 - Battleaxe (AGGRESSIVE)401 - Battleaxe (AGGRESSIVE)395 - Battleaxe (DEFENSIVE)397 - Battleaxe

Here’s my new bug gif too:

@Travas wrote:

[quote=“RandQm, post:11, topic:549048”]1. The woman at home was already missing health when I attacked it. (I assume due somebody else that attacked it and ran away as this only occurred once.[/quote]that would of been me

item.source: Bug List & Missing content [Report bugs here!]

item.title: Bug List & Missing content [Report bugs here!]
item.dc:creator: @RandQm RandQm
item.description:
@RandQm wrote:

  1. The woman at home was already missing health when I attacked it. (I assume due somebody else that attacked it and ran away as this only occurred once.
  2. Multi combat is possible when it shouldn’t (we were attacking the woman at home with 2 players together)
  3. A player his combat level is displayed in white (he was 24, im 4, should be in red as far as i know)
  4. Not able to attack the level 1 rat (i assume the rat just hasn’t been added yet)
  5. Examining an object gives the ID and name rather than the description (i’d assume this is known and is for developing)
  6. Not able to change audio setting in game.
  7. Walk-to distance checking for objects isn’t always right.
  8. Reading a signpost doesn’t do anything (i think this is classified as examining and should give the description?)
  9. Light logs from the ground dc’s you (packet not handled?) and removes the log from the ground.
  10. After trade declining I keep facing the other player and walking (looks like im following) but not moving.
  11. There’s a woman next to the altar in lumby church, I don’t think she should be able to get there.
  12. Restoring prayer at altar doesn’t work, it doesn’t do anything so not added I assume.
  13. Ladders aint working
  14. Using an item on a player dc’s you (packet not handled)
  15. When you pickup the log when attempting to make a fire it will not reset the animation.

You should catch an exception when a packet is not handled yet, it dc’s you.

I’m playing via the webclient

Read full topic

item.title: Bug List & Missing content [Report bugs here!]
item.dc:creator: @eyeownyew Eyeownyew
item.description:
@eyeownyew wrote:

The client login screen remembers volume settings but doesn’t set them (so the bar remains at quiet if i have it set, but it plays very loud next time i start the client, webclient only tested)

The client goes somewhat blurry when logging in, both hd&sd (webclient only tested)

As mentioned many times already, randomly first logins don’t go through. my first two didn’t

if you click a menu twice when in HD (to try to minimize it) it doesn’t, I’m not sure if it’s a bug or even was a feature of 530 i can’t remember

Read full topic

item.title: Bug List & Missing content [Report bugs here!]
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

When training range, (only tested bronze arrows), you only drop 1 arrow 1 time when you attack a creature.

If you walk off or restart the attack, it’ll drop another arrow… but that’s the only way.

Edit: seems to be working-ish… I think the formula (or chance) to drop the arrows is randomized in some way based on the level…
It probably needs some tweaking.

Read full topic

item.source: Bug List & Missing content [Report bugs here!]

item.title: Bug List & Missing content [Report bugs here!]
item.dc:creator: @funyou funyou
item.description:
@funyou wrote:

You can purchase items from the store that are given infinite values (tins, shears, etc) without cash by entering a buy offer for an interger’s max value.
2.147… etc

On occasion, when banking items are invisible when you place them into the bank. This is fixed by closing the bank interface.

Also, on occasion, when removing items from a bank, all items after the item removed disappear. Also fixed by reopening the interface.

Trading is bugged. It says one of the two users declines whenever the first accept is pushed. Not able to trace how it chooses which user, but it flipped back and forth between myself and the other person trying to trade.
It would tell the other person we declined, but we would still be in trade. Then the tradebox would freeze.

You can also noclip while trading with other players.

Will post more when I stumble across them.

Read full topic

item.title: Bug List & Missing content [Report bugs here!]
item.dc:creator: @davidi2 Davidi2
item.description:
@davidi2 wrote:

[size=16pt]Please report any bugs or missing content (that isn’t on the todo list!) here. Please post as much information as possible for bugs, including ways to replicate the bug if you know how.[/size]

Miscellaneous bugs:

[ul][li]Crash on login (HIGH PRIORITY)[/li]
[li]When changing graphics in-game, the attack tab can disappear (fixed with relog)[/li]
[li]Trading crash FIXED[/li]
[li]Buying items from main stock dupe FIXED[/li][/ul]

Skill bugs (incorrect xp, animations, abusability, etc):

[ul][li]Mining: Missing depleted ids[/li]
[li]Cooking: check for fire expiration[/li]
[li]Prayer: Bury bone action bug (caused by block actions not getting undone when action stopped) FIXED[/li][/ul]

Missing/Incorrect NPC Details (animations, spawns, drops, etc):

[ul][li][/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

Missing/Incorrect Weapon Details (animations, bonuses, styles, etc):

[ul][li]Battleaxes[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

Missing/Incorrect Item Details (noting issues, shop values, etc):

[ul][li]All examine info[/li]
[li][/li][/ul]

Read full topic
